summary: communication director barbara morgan could n't contain her anger over olivia nuzzi 's article about weiner 's faltering new york mayoral campaign .   nuzzi claimed many interns only joined the campaign to get close to huma abedin ahead of hillary clinton 's expected 2016 presidential run .   she said weiner mistakenly called her and other interns monica .   morgan called nuzzi a series a expletives , apparently unaware that her rant was ` on the record '   she has since issued an apology and said she contacted nuzzi to personally say she was sorry .
